name: typescript-ast-explorer
description: Command line tool to explore TypeScript projects and SourceFile abstract syntax tree interactively

scripts.test: ts-node node_modules/jasmine/bin/jasmine && node node_modules/blessed/lib/tput.js reset && node node_modules/blessed/lib/tput.js init && node node_modules/blessed/lib/tput.js clear
scripts.all-publish-no-test: npm run all-no-test && git commit -a -m "version patch" && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.all-publish: npm run all && git commit -a -m "version patch" && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.all-no-test: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build && npm run docs
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build && npm test && npm run docs

author: Sebastian Gurin
